Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>","details":"Module to transfer and approve tokens (ETH or ERC20) or data (contract call) based on a security context (daily limit, whitelist, etc). This module is the V2 of TokenTransfer.","methods":{"addModule(address,address)":{"details":"Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered. Unlike its overrided parent, this method can be called via the RelayerModule's execute()","params":{"_module":"The modules to authorise.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"addToWhitelist(address,address)":{"details":"Adds an address to the whitelist of a wallet.","params":{"_target":"The address to add.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"approveToken(address,address,address,uint256)":{"details":"lets the owner approve an allowance of ERC20 tokens for a spender (dApp).","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to approve","_spender":"The address of the spender","_token":"The address of the token to transfer.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"approveTokenAndCallContract(address,address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"lets the owner do an ERC20 approve followed by a call to a contract. We assume that the contract will pull the tokens and does not require ETH.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of ERC20 tokens to approve.","_contract":"The address of the contract.","_data":"The encoded method data","_token":"The token to approve.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"callContract(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"lets the owner call a contract.","params":{"_contract":"The address of the contract.","_data":"The encoded method data","_value":"The amount of ETH to transfer as part of call","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"changeLimit(address,uint256)":{"details":"Lets the owner of a wallet change its daily limit. The limit is expressed in ETH. Changes to the limit take 24 hours.","params":{"_newLimit":"The new limit.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"disableLimit(address)":{"details":"Convenience method to disable the limit The limit is disabled by setting it to an arbitrary large value.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"execute(address,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Executes a relayed transaction.","params":{"_data":"The data for the relayed transaction","_gasLimit":"The gas limit to use for the gas refund.","_gasPrice":"The gas price to use for the gas refund.","_nonce":"The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.","_signatures":"The signatures as a concatenated byte array.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"executePendingTransfer(address,address,address,uint256,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Executes a pending transfer for a wallet. The method can be called by anyone to enable orchestration.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of token to transfer of the pending transfer.","_block":"The block at which the pending transfer was created.","_data":"The data associated to the pending transfer.","_to":"The destination address of the pending transfer.","_token":"The token of the pending transfer.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"getCurrentLimit(address)":{"details":"Gets the current daily limit for a wallet.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"the current limit expressed in ETH."},"getDailyUnspent(address)":{"details":"Gets the amount of tokens that has not yet been spent during the current period.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"the amount of tokens (in ETH) that has not been spent yet and the end of the period."},"getNonce(address)":{"details":"Gets the current nonce for a wallet.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"getPendingLimit(address)":{"details":"Gets a pending limit for a wallet if any.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"the pending limit (in ETH) and the time at chich it will become effective."},"getPendingTransfer(address,bytes32)":{"details":"Gets the info of a pending transfer for a wallet.","params":{"_id":"The pending transfer ID.","_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"the epoch time at which the pending transfer can be executed."},"init(address)":{"details":"Inits the module for a wallet by setting up the isValidSignature (EIP 1271) static call redirection from the wallet to the module and copying all the parameters of the daily limit from the previous implementation of the LimitManager module.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"isLimitDisabled(address)":{"details":"Returns whether the daily limit is disabled for a wallet.","params":{"_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"true if the daily limit is disabled, false otherwise."},"isOnlyOwnerModule()":{"details":"Returns a constant that indicates that the module is an OnlyOwnerModule.","return":"The constant bytes4(keccak256(\"isOnlyOwnerModule()\"))"},"isValidSignature(bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Implementation of EIP 1271. Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.","params":{"_data":"Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(this)","_signature":"Signature byte array associated with _data"}},"isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"Implementation of EIP 1271. Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.","params":{"_msgHash":"Hash of a message signed on the behalf of address(this)","_signature":"Signature byte array associated with _msgHash"}},"isWhitelisted(address,address)":{"details":"Checks if an address is whitelisted for a wallet.","params":{"_target":"The address.","_wallet":"The target wallet."},"return":"true if the address is whitelisted."},"recoverToken(address)":{"details":"Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.","params":{"_token":"The token to recover."}},"removeFromWhitelist(address,address)":{"details":"Removes an address from the whitelist of a wallet.","params":{"_target":"The address to remove.","_wallet":"The target wallet."}},"transferToken(address,address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"lets the owner transfer tokens (ETH or ERC20) from a wallet.","params":{"_amount":"The amoutn of token to transfer","_data":"The data for the transaction","_to":"The destination address","_token":"The address of the token to transfer.","_wallet":"The target devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>
devdoc.details: Module to transfer and approve tokens (ETH or ERC20) or data (contract call) based on a security context (daily limit, whitelist, etc). This module is the V2 of TokenTransfer.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered. Unlike its overrided parent, this method can be called via the RelayerModule's execute()

addToWhitelist(address,address).details: Adds an address to the whitelist of a wallet.

approveToken(address,address,address,uin.details: lets the owner approve an allowance of ERC20 tokens for a spender (dApp).

params._amount: The amount of tokens to approve
params._token: The address of the token to transfer.

approveTokenAndCallContract(address,addr.details: lets the owner do an ERC20 approve followed by a call to a contract. We assume that the contract will pull the tokens and does not require ETH.

params._amount: The amount of ERC20 tokens to approve.

callContract(address,address,uint256,byt.details: lets the owner call a contract.

params._value: The amount of ETH to transfer as part of call

changeLimit(address,uint256).details: Lets the owner of a wallet change its daily limit. The limit is expressed in ETH. Changes to the limit take 24 hours.

disableLimit(address).details: Convenience method to disable the limit The limit is disabled by setting it to an arbitrary large value.

params._data: The data for the relayed transaction
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use for the gas refund.
params._gasPrice: The gas price to use for the gas refund.
params._nonce: The nonce used to prevent replay attacks.
params._signatures: The signatures as a concatenated byte array.

executePendingTransfer(address,address,a.details: Executes a pending transfer for a wallet. The method can be called by anyone to enable orchestration.

params._amount: The amount of token to transfer of the pending transfer.
params._block: The block at which the pending transfer was created.
params._data: The data associated to the pending transfer.
params._to: The destination address of the pending transfer.
params._token: The token of the pending transfer.

getCurrentLimit(address).details: Gets the current daily limit for a wallet.
getCurrentLimit(address).return: the current limit expressed in ETH.

getDailyUnspent(address).details: Gets the amount of tokens that has not yet been spent during the current period.
getDailyUnspent(address).return: the amount of tokens (in ETH) that has not been spent yet and the end of the period.

getNonce(address).details: Gets the current nonce for a wallet.

getPendingLimit(address).details: Gets a pending limit for a wallet if any.
getPendingLimit(address).return: the pending limit (in ETH) and the time at chich it will become effective.

getPendingTransfer(address,bytes32).details: Gets the info of a pending transfer for a wallet.
getPendingTransfer(address,bytes32).return: the epoch time at which the pending transfer can be executed.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by setting up the isValidSignature (EIP 1271) static call redirection from the wallet to the module and copying all the parameters of the daily limit from the previous implementation of the LimitManager module.

isLimitDisabled(address).details: Returns whether the daily limit is disabled for a wallet.
isLimitDisabled(address).return: true if the daily limit is disabled, false otherwise.

isOnlyOwnerModule().details: Returns a constant that indicates that the module is an OnlyOwnerModule.

isValidSignature(bytes,bytes).details: Implementation of EIP 1271. Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.

params._data: Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(this)

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: Implementation of EIP 1271. Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.

params._msgHash: Hash of a message signed on the behalf of address(this)

isWhitelisted(address,address).details: Checks if an address is whitelisted for a wallet.
isWhitelisted(address,address).return: true if the address is whitelisted.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

removeFromWhitelist(address,address).details: Removes an address from the whitelist of a wallet.

transferToken(address,address,address,ui.details: lets the owner transfer tokens (ETH or ERC20) from a wallet.

params._amount: The amoutn of token to transfer
params._token: The address of the token to transfer.

devdoc.title: TransferManager
